attributes.action: Use the new "Green Taxes" imposed on us to replace all London Taxis with Hydrogen fuelled ones.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The technology is here, what are we waiting for? Many manufacturers now boast hydrogen prototypes, and if the £5 extra we pay for airline tickets was directed at starting the worlds first Hydrogen powered taxi fleet surely that would bolster our credibility as an environmentally friendly nation? The air in London would be significantly cleaner and we could at least see our money being put to use.
